==== Notes ====

This server use some nvidia NIC. And the driver forcedeth it's not really stable 

If there's a lot of IN/OUT on the nvidia ethernet you will get some error message like this one:
[3358009.973141] str01: too many iterations (6) in nv_nic_irq.
